root.name: Track Manager
root.description: The track manager enables the use of DSP-like trackProcessors. This can affect the display of tracks, selection in time or by ROIs, and also compute some views like the overlaid and animated local flow graph, polar graph.
root.author: fab - Fabrice de Chaumont
root.changelog:
- Version 1.4.0.5 Date 2014-09-22 15:40:53
display track manager is now a persistent option.
- Version 1.4.0.4 Date 2014-06-10 17:59:49
update on vtkRendering
- Version 1.4.0.3 Date 2014-06-05 15:23:47
Added a null test in removeResult method in TrackPool
- Version 1.4.0.2 Date 2014-06-05 14:20:12
- Fix a display bug if a link has no end. - Fix the OutOfMemory Error: now disable left panel
- Version 1.4.0.1 Date 2014-05-19 18:08:11
Fix to fit new VTK lib.
- Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2014-04-25 11:55:02
Fix: some links could not be deleted Fix: display of links: speed improvement Fix: some links were duplicated Fix some editing issue in the track editor
- Version 1.3.0.22 Date 2014-03-31 16:04:09
Track panel is now a bit faster to draw.
- Version 1.3.0.21 Date 2014-03-31 15:52:41
Added: a new option to disable the tracking panel. This should speed up the rendering a bit if many tracks are displayed.
- Version 1.3.0.20 Date 2014-03-13 18:37:05
- The xms file does not need anymore to specify a classname for each detection.
- Version 1.3.0.19 Date 2014-01-24 17:52:37
Now imports the XML files generated by TrackMate
- Version 1.3.0.18 Date 2014-01-20 12:14:29
Minor upgrade: Selector for track processor is smaller.
- Version 1.3.0.17 Date 2013-08-19 14:39:59
Fixed a problem that occurred when splitting a track when several group are displayed.
- Version 1.3.0.16 Date 2013-07-12 17:56:45
New: Select by track lenght ( in nb of detection )
- Version 1.3.0.15 Date 2013-07-11 14:14:43
Fix: Problem with painter.
- Version 1.3.0.14 Date 2013-07-03 15:24:00
- Fix: rendering of sequence with camera
- Version 1.3.0.13 Date 2013-07-01 17:09:17
Fixed the "fuse all tracks" feature.
- Version 1.3.0.12 Date 2013-06-25 13:17:05
- Now call the painter of the detection (if enabled)
- Version 1.3.0.11 Date 2013-06-15 12:41:02
Added trackPool access from the trackManager
- Version 1.3.0.10 Date 2013-06-15 12:25:47
- add getTrackSegmentWithDetection in track group
- Version 1.3.0.9 Date 2013-06-15 11:23:57
log info removed
- Version 1.3.0.8 Date 2013-06-15 11:05:54
some changes for dev:
fix : getTrackSegmentWithDetection now scan all track groups new: clearAllTrackSegment in trackGroup
- Version 1.3.0.7 Date 2013-01-24 14:15:53
Fix a problem while building the image containing all the track in the left panel. If the dimension w*h > 2 billion then the bitmap can't be created due to java buffer index limitation. I put the limit to 1 Billion. If reached, the left panel is disabled but tracks are still displayed.
- Version 1.3.0.6 Date 2012-12-10 18:10:20
minor fixes
- Version 1.3.0.5 Date 2012-11-15 16:28:21
- Fix a bug related to the unload of swimming pool objects.
- Version 1.3.0.4 Date 2012-11-14 17:12:19
- can remove links (just re create a link over an existing one will remove it) - bug fix if no sequence is displayed - track unique id added to xml and tracksegment structure - now load and saves links - Color track processor is loaded by default
- known problem : loading 2 times the same track file may cause problems (because of this new unique track id)
- Version 1.3.0.3 Date 2012-10-18 16:50:57
- Fixed a bug if one select a track and no sequence displays the tracks. - Improve "delete selection" speed
- Version 1.3.0.2 Date 2012-10-11 11:59:36
Fix: Track load tests added.
- Version 1.3.0.1 Date 2012-10-07 11:55:58
Fixed: clean exit of the trackmanager (remove all processors and overlays)
- Version 1.3.0.0 Date 2012-10-06 17:55:29
- Now supports child/parent track edition with split and merge.
- Fixed a problem when the trackmanager closed and tracks were still visible
- Version 1.2.0.13 Date 2012-02-15 18:04:54
new Stable
- Version 1.2.0.12b Date 2012-02-15 17:58:40
-Tracks are now shifted by 0.5 pix to be centered on pixels -You can specify on which sequence the track are displayed -3D rendering improved (a lot) -Track should now not be displayed anymore while exiting the trackManager
- Version 1.2.0.11 Date 2011-12-08 11:32:33
add: link between tracks
- Version 1.2.0.10 Date 2011-12-07 17:07:59
Fix: Now manage if a track does not have any detection.
- Version 1.2.0.9 Date 2011-12-07 16:06:37
update to fit with new detection data structure
- Version 1.2.0.8 Date 2011-11-22 16:11:32
Fix a display bug (black box) on last detection.
- Version 1.2.0.7 Date 2011-11-22 16:02:20
Second fix of the Last detection view problem
- Version 1.2.0.6 Date 2011-11-22 11:06:12
Fix the display of the detection: the very last detection of a sequence was not displayed properly
- Version 1.2.0.5 Date 2011-10-27 09:58:39
- Version 1.2.0.4 Date 2011-10-06 16:21:14
test for general debug
- Version 1.2.0.3 Date 2011-09-23 17:22:52
- UI change: more space for track processor. - UI Change: simplier zoom buttons - Group of track can now be selected by the menu. - Help online menu - File now support virtual detection, selection state and color.
- Version 1.2.0.2 Date 2011-09-15 17:27:48
- Version 1.2.0.1 Date 2011-09-15 17:09:50
load / save improvements
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2011-09-15 14:20:22
fix: background of track view could be black with certain magnifications fix: trackview's scrollbars were not refreshed after zoom operations. add: Track processors can now collapse add: XML load and save support.
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2011-09-02 16:09:34
A lot of fixes GUI revised. Should be faster. Select track in one click either in the sequence viewer and in the internal track display
- Version 1.0.0.4 Date 2011-08-30 15:24:43
Better presentation of the track processor list.
- Version 1.0.0.3 Date 2011-08-25 16:36:53
- Version 1.0.0.2 Date 2011-08-25 16:32:52
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2011-03-25 11:39:18
minor bugfix
- Version 1.0.0.0b Date 2011-03-24 14:25:11
Beta version
